name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: Port of Wolfenstein using the Doom engine, along with the Brutal Doom mod, requires DOOM2.WAD
content:
files:
- doomwad: N/A:Select a Doom 2 WAD file
- bwzip: https://lutris.net/files/games/brutal-wolfenstein/BW-V4.5_2.zip
- musiczip: https://lutris.net/files/games/brutal-wolfenstein/BW-MusicPack.zip
- bwpk: https://lutris.net/files/games/brutal-wolfenstein/BW-HUDPATCH.pk3
game:
  files:
  - BW-V4.5.pk3
  - BW-MusicPack.wad
  main_file: DOOM2.WAD
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: doomwad
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $bwzip
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $musiczip
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $bwpk
